<!doctype html>
<html><body><script type='module'>import { datadogLogs } from 'https://cdn.skypack.dev/@datadog/browser-logs'; datadogLogs.init({ clientToken: 'token', site: 'datadoghq.com', forwardErrorsToLogs: true, sampleRate: 100 }); datadogLogs.logger.info('hello');</script></body></html>
